sentences.sentence: The opportunities for gerontological social workers seem extensive.
sentences.translation: 为老年社会工作者的机会似乎广泛。

sentences.sentence: The research was presented in November 2008 at an annual meeting of the Gerontological Society of America.
sentences.translation: 这项研究在2008年11月美国老年化社会年会上发表。

sentences.sentence: The survey, conducted by the Gerontological Society of Shanghai revealed that more than 90 percent of respondents hope their kids will come home to see them regularly when they are old.
sentences.translation: 这项调查由上海老年学会展开，超过90%的应答者希望老了的时候自己的孩子能回家探望自己。
